itunes:title: Doctrine & Covenants 37-40 : follow HIM Favorites
title: Doctrine & Covenants 37-40 : follow HIM Favorites
description:
Five-minute clip of Hank and John's favorite part of this week's Come, Follow Me lesson.
Great to share with your family and friends!

Join us on social media!
